page.title: 17A Childs Day
page.content: Damian. Every Saturday I get up at 8.00 AM, get dressed, have my breakfast and feed the goldfish and the tropical fish and the cat. Then I watch some television. At 9.00 AM I go to the swimming club till 10.30 AM. Then I walk into Knutsford from the swimming baths. After looking around Knutsford I go home for lunch. Then I cycle to my friend Steven's house. I play there all afternoon and come home at 5.00 PM. Then I have my tea. I watch television from 8.30 to 9.30 PM then go upstairs and listen to records until I fall asleep at 11.00 PM.
